titles: Dialogicall discourses of spirits and divels declaring their proper essence, natures, dispositions, and operations, their possessions and dispossessions : with other the appendantes, peculiarly appertaining to those speciall points, verie conducent, and pertinent to the timely procuring of some Christian conformitie in iudgement, for the peaceable compounding of the late sprong controuersies concerning all such intricate and difficult doubts / by [brace] Iohn Deacon, Iohn Walker...
author: Deacon, John, fl. 1585-1616.
Walker, John, preacher.
notes: Errors in paging: p. 37, 134, and 350-351 misnumbered 35, 234, and  340-341 respectively.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
